alternativeNames: Vicq, (Léon-Bonaventure) Éloy de; de Vicq, (Léon-Bonaventure) Éloy
comments: Published about the Somme area of France.
examples: Galeopsis ladanum var. littoralis Vicq & Brutel., Cat. rais. pl. Somme: 185 (1865) (Mém. Soc. Imp. Émul. Abbeville, 1865: 487 1865).
source: Barnhart, Biogr. Notes upon Botanists (1965). Notice of death in Bull Soc. Bot. France, 33: 219 (1886).
